sentences.english: As self-actualization messengers, the two men are an odd couple. Mr.
sentences.chinese: 作爲自我實現的傳播者，這兩人堪稱一個奇怪的組合。

sentences.english: Money-seekers also score lower on tests of vitality and self-actualization.
sentences.chinese: 追求金錢的人活力和自我實現力相對更低。

sentences.english: It is a driving force which promotes the growth and self-actualization of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 它亦是促成個體自然成長與自我實現的趨力。

sentences.english: For us it hinders self-realization and merits corrective surgery.
sentences.chinese: 對我們來說這隱含了自我實現和矯正手術的優點。

sentences.english: From ancient times until today, Chinese culture has lacked the spirit of self-realization.
sentences.chinese: 從古至今，中國文化都缺少了自我實現的精神。

sentences.english: Such beliefs, once they take hold, are likely to be self-fulfilling.
sentences.chinese: 這類信念一旦佔據人們的大腦，便極有可能自我實現。

sentences.english: Financial market can make inflation self-fulfilling through commodity speculation.
sentences.chinese: 金融市場可使通脹通過大宗商品投機而自我實現。

sentences.english: The interest expression is an important link of interest self-accomplishment.
sentences.chinese: 利益表達是利益自我實現的一個重要環節。

sentences.english: Every success Ba Jin made can be considered to be a journey of self-fulfillment.
sentences.chinese: 巴金的每一次成功的創作都是一次自我實現的歷程。

sentences.english: I often have the pleasure to give lectures and training on motivation and self-realization.
sentences.chinese: 我常常很高興去做關於動機和自我實現的報告和培訓。

sentences.english: I know many people are passionate about self-realization.
sentences.chinese: 我知道許多人熱衷於“自我實現”。

sentences.english: So let me move on now to the next lecture, " which is "Belief as Self-Fulfilling Prophecies".
sentences.chinese: 現在開始下一課，“信念即自我實現預言。

sentences.english: Leisure is the need of human self-fulfilment , and it can mold human individuality.
sentences.chinese: 休閒是人的自我實現的需要，塑造自由個性。

sentences.english: With self-knowledge the craving for self-fulfilment is transformed.
sentences.chinese: 隨着自知，對自我實現的渴望會被轉變。

definition: to run in the opposite direction (idiom); to run counter to
to try hard to/to strive to
to take an alternate route (idiom)/to find an alternative/to take a different approach/to blaze a new trail
(abbr. for 嘗試錯誤|尝试错误) trial and error/failure
different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
to sublimate/sublimation (physics)/to raise to a higher level/to refine/promotion
